title: Interpolated Identities: Creating a Complex Experiential Commitment to the Virtual
description: A thesis about virtual worlds, gamification, & the role of designers and developers in creating hyperreality.

title: Tactilis Mensa
description: A prototype for an alternative art collection browsing system. I built a table-sized touch screen device (using a projector, a webcam, a low-power PC, lots of MDF, and infrared light), then designed a prototype interface for navigating the UoW Art Collection. This work was on display as part of the Digital Natives art exhibition.
